    # c(
    #   "\n" = " ", "\t" = " ", " \ " = "", "\\[|\\]" = "",
    #   "♂♂" = "males", "♂♀" = "male and female", "♀♂" = "female and male",
    #  "♀♀" = "females",
    #   "♂" = "male", "♀" = "female", "ü" = "u", "ğ" = "g", "Š" = "S",
    #   "š" = "s", "ş" = "s", "á" = "a", "é" = "e", "ě" = "e", "í" = "i",
    #   "±" = "plus-minus", ">" = "greater-than", "<" = "less-than",
    #   "ň" = "n", "ł" = "l", "ß" = "ss", "ö" = "o", "Ö" = "O", "ä" = "a",
    #   "ř" = "r", "©" = "", "Ⓒ" = "", "@" = "at", "&" = "and"
    # )
